sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading down 0.3%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 22.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is United Technologies ( UTX ), trading down 2.6%.
United Technologies is lower by about 22.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ), trading down 2.1%, and McDonald's ( MCD ), trading down 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
